title: League not updating.
body:
I'm on a mac and every time I try to update league nearly halfway in the update it says "Unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information". I have tried connecting directly to the router and been trying to get it updated off and on for the past 3 days as it's very stressful. I have also tried to repair the client. The same message always comes up at some point  in the process. 


I will add a link the next time I get this message which should be within an hour.

replies.body:
This often occurs if your connection to our patching servers is *unstable*. I recommend working through the steps listed in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all of your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
